name: Find the Balance (Clone)
description:
This is my clone of the game "Find The Balance"  by  Digital Melody and Wastelands Interactive.

The game is very simple. All you have to do is balance all of the objects into as tall a tower as you can without having it topple onto the blades.

I made this to teach myself some C# programming in Unity and I had a lot of fun making it.

Game design, music and sound: Matt Hart

Artwork: K Hart
